simpledb

Interface IndexDbIterator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DbIterator, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IndexDbIterator
extends DbIterator
    IndexDBIterator is the interface that index access methods implement in SimpleDb.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void open(IndexPredicate ipred)
      Open the access method such that when getNext is called, it iterates through the tuples that satisfy ipred.
      void rewind(IndexPredicate ipred)
      Begin a new index scan with the specified predicate.

      • Methods inherited from interface simpledb.DbIterator

        close, getTupleDesc, hasNext, next, open, rewind

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(IndexPredicate ipred)
          throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                 DbException,
                 TransactionAbortedException
        Open the access method such that when getNext is called, it iterates through the tuples that satisfy ipred.
        Parameters:
        ipred - The predicate that is used to scan the index.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • rewind

            throws DbException,
                   TransactionAbortedException
        Begin a new index scan with the specified predicate.
        Parameters:
        ipred - The predicate that is used to scan the index.
        Throws:
